name: A Glorious Rule
description:
Manage your UNSTABLE dictatorship by controlling the rebel protests using the power of puzzles!

Issue directives to control each area and manipulate the rebels into following your vision.

Controls:

  • Only a mouse! It’s all you need! Just touch the things!
  • Also you can use R to reset the current board to its original state. But that's really all of them!

Note: There's a weird bug on the browser playable one where it starts too zoomed in but if you maximise and go into the first level and un-maximise it will be fine! Hooray for strange bugs!
